alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 3:11AM EST until February 18 at 1:57PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Blue River at Fredericksburg affecting Washington and Harrison Counties. .Heavy rain from the past 24 hours will cause the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Blue River at Fredericksburg. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, water covers parts of Fredericksburg-Depauw Road near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 19.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 20.3 feet. It will then fall below flood stage later this morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued later this morning.
